intro: Show a RED light when device powers ON and a Green light when READY

steps: 1. Place the RGB Led on the Breadboard.
2. Place three, 220 ohm resistors on the breadboard
3. Connect jumper wires between R3 and RGB and between R1 and the RGB
1. Connect a jumper wire from D2 to R1.
2. Connect a jumper wire from D4 to R2.
3. Connect a jumper wire from D6 to R3.
1. Place a pushbutton and one 220ohm resistor on the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from D10 to one side of the resistor
3. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the pushbutton
1. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to one side of the resistor
3. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative terminal of RGB
